isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - SHORE POWER WIRING (08WET) WITH INVERTER (08WES)

svcproc.title: SHORE POWER WIRING (08WET) WITH INVERTER (08WES)
svcproc.para: The DC/AC inverter provides AC power to the shore power outlets (power socket) to enable 110 VAC accessories to be plugged in. The AC sockets are the bunk bulkhead outlet, the TV/VCR cabinet outlet, the load center outlet (left under bunk storage area) and the left side utility cabinet outlet (W/72" sleeper only). The sleeper panel has the inverter on/off control switch.
